devdoc.details: ERC-1155 with native metatransaction methods. These additional functions allow users     to presign function calls and allow third parties to execute these on their behalf.

params._owner: The address of the token holder

balanceOf(address,uint256).return: The _owner's balance of the Token type requested

params._owners: The addresses of the token holders

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).return: The _owner's balance of the Token types requested (i.e. balance for each (owner, id) pair)

getIDBinIndex(uint256).return: (Bin number, ID"s index within that bin)

params._signer: Address to query signature nonce for

params._binAmount: uint256 containing the balances of IDS_PER_UINT256 ids
params._index: Index at which to retrieve amount

isApprovedForAll(address,address).return: True if the operator is approved, false if not

isValidSignature(address,bytes,bytes).details: Verifies that a hash has been signed by the given signer.

params._data: Data structure that was hashed and signed
params._sig: Proof that the hash has been signed by signer.
params._signerAddress: Address that should have signed the given hash.

isValidSignature(address,bytes,bytes).return: True if the address recovered from the provided signature matches the input signer address.

params._approved: True if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval
params._data: Encodes signature and gas payment receipt  _data should be encoded as ((bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, SignatureType sigType), (GasReceipt g))  i.e. high level encoding should be (bytes, bytes), where the latter bytes array is a nested bytes array
params._isGasReimbursed: Whether gas will be reimbursed or not, with vlid signature
params._operator: Address to add to the set of authorized operators
params._owner: Address that wants to set operator status  _spender

params._data: Encodes a meta transfer indicator, signature, gas payment receipt and extra transfer data  _data should be encoded as (bytes4 METATRANSFER_FLAG, (bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, SignatureType sigType), (GasReceipt g, bytes data))  i.e. high level encoding should be (bytes4, bytes, bytes), where the latter bytes array is a nested bytes array  METATRANSFER_FLAG should be 0xebc71fa5 for meta transfer with gas reimbursement  METATRANSFER_FLAG should be 0x3fed7708 for meta transfer WITHOUT gas reimbursement (and hence without gasReceipt)

Encodes a meta transfer indicator, signature, gas payment receipt and extra transfer data  _data should be encoded as (bytes4 METATRANSFER_FLAG, (bytes32 r, bytes32 s, uint8 v, SignatureType sigType), (GasReceipt g, bytes data))  i.e. high level encoding should be (bytes4, bytes, bytes), where the latter bytes array is a nested bytes array  METATRANSFER_FLAG should be 0xebc71fa5 for meta transfer with gas reimbursement  METATRANSFER_FLAG should be 0x3fed7708 for meta transfer WITHOUT gas reimbursement (and hence without gasReceipt)

params._approved: True if the operator is approved, false to revoke approval
params._operator: Address to add to the set of authorized operators

params._interfaceID: The interface identifier, as specified in ERC-165

params._binAmount: uint256 containing the balances of IDS_PER_UINT256 ids
params._index: Index at which to retrieve amount

balanceOf(address,uint256).notice: Get the balance of an account's Tokens

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).notice: Get the balance of multiple account/token pairs

getIDBinIndex(uint256).notice: Return the bin number and index within that bin where ID is

getNonce(address).notice: Returns the current nonce associated with a given address

isApprovedForAll(address,address).notice: Queries the approval status of an operator for a given owner

metaSetApprovalForAll(address,address,bo.notice: Approve the passed address to spend on behalf of _from if valid signature is provided

safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,ui.notice: Allows anyone with a valid signature to transfer multiple types of tokens on the bahalf of _from

safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256.notice: Allows anyone with a valid signature to transfer _amount amount of a token _id on the bahalf of _from

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).notice: Enable or disable approval for a third party ("operator") to manage all of caller's tokens

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Query if a contract implements an interface

writeValueInBin(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Return the updated _binAmount after writing _amount at _index
